qas.question: What Apple program is used to communicate between computers and portable devices?
Which operating systems are compatible with iTunes?
What's the name of the software used to manage music and other media on Apple devices?

context: Apple's <a0_0><a2_0>iTunes<a2_0/><a0_0/> software (and other alternative software) can be used to transfer music, photos, videos, games, contact information, e-mail settings, Web bookmarks, and calendars, to the devices supporting these features from computers using certain versions of <a1_0>Apple Macintosh and Microsoft Windows<a1_0/> operating systems.
